onboarding: Welcome to ReliefMap where you can find nearby disaster relief help like shelter, food, and medical aid.
Select your disaster, and find help that's relevant to where you are and what you need.
Use the filter button to find specific types of aid, then tap on the map pins to learn more details.
Get trusted updates directly from official sources.
You're ready. Sign-up, login, or continue as a guest.
selectDisaster: Select a disaster to view resources
clickDisasterTabFirst: Click on the Disaster tab first
pleaseSelectMap: Please select a disaster to view the map
createAccount: Create your account to get started
welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please login to your account
passwordResetEmailSent: If an account exists with this email, you will receive password reset instructions.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

aboutSubtitle: A real-time guide to help, hope, and safety.
signInToRate: Sign in to rate this facility
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
clearCacheConfirm: This will clear all cached data. Are you sure?
notificationMessage: We will now notify you of new nearby resources.
offlineModeMessage: We will store this information on your phone so you can access it without the need for wifi.
locationServicesMessage: If you are inside a disaster area, we will show your location so you can see what's nearby.
redCrossServices: Overnight shelter, meals, snacks and water; health services (for disaster-related conditions), such as first aid, refilling lost prescriptions or replacing lost eyeglasses; emotional support and mental health services; spiritual care; help reconnecting with loved ones; information about disaster-related resources in the community.
partnershipServices: Partnership with Redcross and LA county Officials: Shelter for Refugees. Hosting Firefighters to be able to sleep and Shower. A safe and secure place to sit, work, charge devices, or access WiFi to come to our church campus. Facility is currently available to accommodate this need and anyone is welcome to come today through Thursday.
